method.name: setPlotMSFilename
method.shortdescription: Sets the MS filename to the given.
method.description: Sets the MS filename for the plot at the given index. If updateImmediately is true, this change takes effect immediately; otherwise it will only be applied next time update() is called.

param.name: msFilename
param.description: MS filename to be plotted

param.name: updateImmediately
param.description: whether to apply this change immediately, IF the GUI is currently in its execution loop

param.name: plotIndex
param.description: the index of the plot to apply this change

method.name: getPlotMSFilename
method.shortdescription: Gets the MS filename.
method.description: Gets the MS filename for the plot at the given index.

param.name: plotIndex
param.description: the index of the plot to get the value for

returns.description: The MS filename for the plot at the given index.

method.name: setPlotMSAveraging
method.shortdescription: Sets the MS averaging parameters.
method.description: Sets the MS averaging parameters for the plot at the given index, using individual flags and values. Baseline and antenna averaging are mutually exclusive; only one (or none) can be true at the same time. If updateImmediately is true, this change takes effect immediately; otherwise it will only be applied next time update() is called.

param.name: channel
param.description: MS averaging flag for channel

param.name: channelValue
param.description: MS averaging value for channel

param.name: time
param.description: MS averaging flag for time

param.name: timeValue
param.description: MS averaging value for time

param.name: scan
param.description: MS averaging flag for scan

param.name: field
param.description: MS averaging flag for field

param.name: baseline
param.description: MS averaging flag for baseline, mutually exclusive with antenna

param.name: antenna
param.description: MS averaging flag for antenna, mutually exclusive with baseline

param.name: spw
param.description: MS averaging flag for spw

param.name: updateImmediately
param.description: whether to apply this change immediately, IF the GUI is currently in its execution loop

param.name: plotIndex
param.description: the index of the plot to apply this change
